Key Match Events: Mahmoud Al Aswad scored for Syria in the 7th minute
Pablo Sabbag scored in injury time
Post-Match Reflections: Manolo Marquez began his stint as India head coach on a disappointing note
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first time Syria won a title on Indian soil
Others: Syria had beaten India 1-0 in the Asian Cup in Qatar in January, this year
